features: WOOL WICKING MOISTURE: Made of sheep wool-blend lining, Guide Gear men's house slippers pamper your feet with soft fuzz while collecting moisture so feet do not overheat.
STRONG SUEDE SLIPPERS: Indoor boots for men are composed of cowhide suede uppers that are tough in construction but lightweight in wear. Slippers are durable enough to handle a trip to the mailbox.
TOP TIER TRACTION: With a rubber outsole, Guide Gear boot slippers for men are top notch in traction so less slip ups and more control within movements.
CUSHIONED FOOTBED: Enjoy pillow-like comfort on our men's slipper booties. Every step is cushioned for relaxing wear during the winter season.
TOASTY AND COZY: Your number one winter essential. Our warm male slippers guarantee you protection from the cold with our super soft sheep wool that snuggles your feet with heat.
description: Experience a new level of coziness and comfort with Guide Gear mens slippers. The interior lining is composed of a sheep's wool blend, which pampers your cold-sensitive feet with toasty heat and skin-friendly fuzz. Your feet will never want to go bare again. Boots are also composed of genuine cowhide suede uppers for long-lasting and durable support. Like drinking hot chocolate on a winter day, these boots will provide that warm familiar feeling with a sense of ultimate relaxation.

Pamper your feet to some fluff! Made with sheep wool-blend lining, our fuzzy boots blanket your feet with warmth and snuggles. Keep feet functional during those cold winter days. With a length of 10 inches, the extra coverage will make lounging a comfortable gesture. Rubber outsole is soft and flexible, enabling you to wear these big and tall slippers outside with traction that will keep you upright and stable throughout use. No need to worry about slip-ups!
